unnormalised: Hey guys, someone asked me about Govt. education schemes recently so thought I'd share what I know. So basically, the govt. runs a bunch of programs to help students, especially those from poorer backgrounds. One popular one is the "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan" (SSA). It aims to provide free and compulsory education to all children aged 6-14 yrs.

unnormalised: Don't forget programs like the "Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan" (RMSA) that focus on improving the quality of secondary education. And some states, like Tamil Nadu, have their own schemes like providing free laptops to students who score above 90% in their 12th std exams. So yeah, there are quite a few options out there. Hope this helped!
